wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Wollaston (March 1865 – 1933) was an English footballer who played in The Football League for Aston Villa.Arthur played a minor role in the Aston Villa squad during the inaugural Football League season of 1888–1889. He made his League debut at Right-Half on 8 December 1888 at Trent Bridge when Aston Villa played Notts County. Aston Villa won comfortably, 4–2. Wollaston played 4 League games at Right-Half and one FA Cup tie at Left-Half. After playing against Derby County at County Ground Wollaston never played League football again.
